article_title: More Polls Show GOP Misreads Public on Obamacare
article_text:
According to the poll, just more than four in 10 say they favor the law, with 56% opposed to it.

But of those opposed, 38% say they are against the law because they think it's too liberal and 12% say it's not liberal enough. That means that 53% either support Obamacare, or say it's not liberal enough.

article_metadata.title: More Polls Show GOP Misreads Public on Obamacare

og.description: The law remains unpopular, but not because people buy the GOP’s arguments.
og.title: On Obamacare, ‘Disapprove’ Doesn’t Mean What the GOP Thinks It Means
